org.overload.ui.title
Class FrameTitleManager

java.lang.Object
  org.overload.ui.title.FrameTitleManager

public abstract class FrameTitleManager
extends java.lang.Object

Dynamically manage the title of frames.
Temporary titles with timeouts.

Author:
Odell

Constructor Summary
FrameTitleManager(java.awt.Frame frame, java.lang.String defaultTitle)
          Initializes a new FrameTitleManager.
 
Method Summary
 void appendTitle(java.lang.String append)
          Modifies given text to the default title of the controlled frame.
abstract  void onTitleChanged(java.lang.String title)
          Occurs when the title of this frame changes due to this FrameTitleManager.
This will not listen for changes to the title done manually.
 void reset()
          Sets the title of the controlled frame to the default title.
 void setDefaultTitle(java.lang.String defaultTitle)
          Changes the default title of this frame.
 void setDefaultTitle(java.lang.String defaultTitle, boolean modify)
          Changes the default title of this frame.
This will automatically update the frame itself,
if the modify boolean is true or as long as a temporary title hasn't been submitted.

          Sets the title of the controlled frame.

FrameTitleManager

public FrameTitleManager(java.awt.Frame frame,
                         java.lang.String defaultTitle)
Initializes a new FrameTitleManager.

Parameters:
frame - the frame to control.
defaultTitle - the default title of this frame.
Method Detail

setDefaultTitle

public final void setDefaultTitle(java.lang.String defaultTitle)
Changes the default title of this frame.

Parameters:
defaultTitle - the new default title of the controlled frame.

setDefaultTitle

public final void setDefaultTitle(java.lang.String defaultTitle,
                                  boolean modify)
Changes the default title of this frame.
This will automatically update the frame itself,
if the modify boolean is true or as long as a temporary title hasn't been submitted.

Parameters:
defaultTitle - the new default title of the controlled frame.

reset

public final void reset()
Sets the title of the controlled frame to the default title.

setTitle

public final void setTitle(java.lang.String title)
Sets the title of the controlled frame.

Parameters:
title - the suggested title of the frame.

appendTitle

public final void appendTitle(java.lang.String append)
Modifies given text to the default title of the controlled frame.

Parameters:
append - the text to append the default title.

submit

public final void submit(java.lang.String title,
                         int period)
Submits a temporary title to the frame.

Parameters:
title - the temporary title.
period - the time period in milliseconds for the temporary title to last.

submitAppend

public final void submitAppend(java.lang.String append,
                               int period)
Submits temporary text to the title of the frame.

Parameters:
append - the temporary append text.
period - the time period in milliseconds for the temporary text to last.

onTitleChanged

public abstract void onTitleChanged(java.lang.String title)
Occurs when the title of this frame changes due to this FrameTitleManager.
This will not listen for changes to the title done manually.

Parameters:
title - the new title of the controlled frame.
